text: Did I miss the part where I asked for your opinion?
I've been searching for who asked. Even Google couldn't find them.
Hold on, let me check my notes... aaaaand, nobody asked.
Your opinion is noted. And filed under 'Things I Didn't Ask For'.
My ancestors fought for my right to speak, not for you to ask if anyone asked.
404: The person who asked was not found.
Was there a 'please interrupt me' sign I was unaware of?
I'm sorry, I must have mistaken you for someone who I asked.
The voices in my head didn't ask, and they're the only ones I'm obligated to listen to.
If I wanted your opinion, I would have given it to you.
The council has reviewed your statement and has concluded that nobody, in fact, asked.
Are you the human embodiment of an unskippable ad?
I'm currently accepting applications for 'who asked'. You are not qualified.
Paging... paging anyone who asked... The line seems to be dead.
Your contribution has been noted and will be ignored.
